title: PBE
body: The PBE status page has error where it would not let me know where my status stands for PBE. It says something went wrong but it also states I have been accepted. However, I probably didn't because I never got the email. Is there someway to check my status.

replies.body:
We've been having a few issues with the PBE signup page, but the best way to know if we've invited you onto PBE is to check for that invitation e-mail. I went ahead and pulled up your account, and it doesn't look like we've gotten a PBE request from this account yet. 

Until we get the kinks ironed out, you can try using a different browser or [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) to see if that gets you onto the signup page!
